website_summaries.verdict: You’ll never see a car wearing Superman’s cape elsewhere, but if anyone can translate the Justice League into charming vehicle toys, it would certainly be Hot Wheels.
pros: Set of 5 cars designed after the members of the Justice League: Superman, Batman, Cyborg, Aquaman, and Wonder Woman
cons: Some cars may not be compatible with certain Hot Wheels playsets

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 3 year old into cars
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 3 year old grandson and he loved it! He said this was his favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: UNREADABLE
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I can’t read the fine print It seems to be a problem for seniors but Amazon.com is for young people. If you can tell me how to increase the size of your fine print

customer_reviews.title: Universe Justice hot wheels.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I had was the pricing. They sell in stores for $3.99 pk of 5 hot wheels.

customer_reviews.title: Best super hero cars
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son is obsessed with super heros and he freaked out when he saw these. He carries them everywhere. They are his favorites! So glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Great cars! Grandson loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cars excellent colors, detail etc. The reason I gave it four stars is that the outer packaging was broken. But the cars were fine.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome

customer_reviews.title: Love them

customer_reviews.title: Really cool cars

customer_reviews.title: Cars!

customer_reviews.title: looks good!
customer_reviews.text: how can you go wrong with Hot Wheels?? it's fun in a package. any Justice League fan will love this. the only thing i fear is that my friend's grandson will receive more than the one that i am giving for Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Justice League and Hot Wheels are a great combination!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew just loved this set of Hot Wheels and played with them all evening long when he got them for Christmas. They were a hit!

customer_reviews.title: Captain America

product_meta.title: Hot Wheels DC Universe Justice League 5-Pack, Vehicle
product_meta.description: Hot Wheels and Justice League fans will love recreating Super Hero moments with this 5-Pack of premium character cars that includes five members of the Justice League team from the new movie in one pack. Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman and Cyborg all feature unique decos and details themed to the Justice League movie and they are ready to save the day. Cyborg features an exclusive "power-up" deco to help him take on the team's foes! These premium character cars are an instant collection! Not for use with some Hot Wheels sets. Each sold separately, subject to availability. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: ​Hot Wheels and Justice League fans will love recreating Super Hero moments with this 5-pack of premium character cars that includes five members of the Justice League team from the new movie in one pack.
​Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman and Cyborg all feature unique decos and details themed to the Justice League movie and they are ready to save the day.
​The Cyborg character car features an exclusive “power-up” deco to help him take on the team’s foes!
​The 1:64 scale exclusive character cars features unique decos and details themed to the Justice League movie.
​These premium character cars are an instant collection for Super Hero fans!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
